metadata.Title: CVE-2019-13626 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: SDL (Simple DirectMedia Layer) 2.x through 2.0.9 has a heap-based buffer over-read in Fill_IMA_ADPCM_block, caused by an integer overflow in IMA_ADPCM_decode() in audio/SDL_wave.c.

notes.Note: avital> The patch in SDL 2.0 is enormous and should be applied with care. The upstream patch to backport is spread across three upstream commits: https://hg.libsdl.org/SDL/rev/b06fa7da012b https://hg.libsdl.org/SDL/rev/a39d8cdf50f4 https://hg.libsdl.org/SDL/rev/572f29f98da0

criterions.comment: libsdl2 package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.0.10+dfsg1-1ubuntu1').
